argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplelf.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | mplelf.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | mplelf.b | |- B = ( Base ` P ) |
| 4 |  | mplelf.d | |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 5 |  | mplelf.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 6, 3, 7 | #P_mplbasss | |- B C_ ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) |
| 9 | 8, 5 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 2, 4, 7, 9 | #P_psrelbas | |- ( ph -> X : D --> K ) |
